gene.function: FUNCTION: Plays a role in the regulation of endolysosomal pH in immune cells such as B-cells, dendritic cells and monocytes. May be involved in endolysosomal-dependent immune responses. {ECO:0000269|PubMed:31001245}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Nucleus {ECO:0000269|PubMed:31092820}. Cytoplasm {ECO:0000269|PubMed:31092820}. Note=May colocalize with TLR7 in the endosomal pathway. {ECO:0000269|PubMed:31092820}.
